reasoning: Bilateral congenital cataracts represent ~30-50% of all congenital cataracts. Congenital cataracts occur in 1-6 per 100k births; bilateral cases estimate ~2-3 per 100k births.
source: Rahi JS et al. (2003). Congenital and infantile cataracts: epidemiology, aetiology and clinical outcome. Eye. 17(9):1002-1011
